articles.title: Rupali Ganguly says she was treated like an outcast when she started doing TV to run home, pay father’s hospital bills - The Indian Express
articles.description: Rupali Ganguly said that she signed television roles without negotiating the money because she wanted to shift her father to a better hospital.
